alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Buchanan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 8:12PM CDT until June 21 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Doniphan County in northeastern Kansas... Northwestern Buchanan County in northwestern Missouri... South central Andrew County in northwestern Missouri... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 812 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wathena, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Wathena, Elwood, Troy, Country Club Villa, Country Club, Agency and St. Joseph Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 41 and 55. Interstate 229 between mile markers 0 and 13. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
